heading: GENERAL EXCHANGE PROGRAM

companyAddress.content: 121, Estate Building, Off M. G. Road,

bodyMainContentArray.bodyMainContent: I voluntarily offer my jewellery that I have purchased from Tanishq for the purpose of exchanging in the same under the General Exchange Program, Tanishq.

subBullettedPoints.bullettedPointContent: For melting / breaking the jewellery given by me to assess the final purity and losses if any, during the process due to dirt, volatile impurity etc.
That in case I take back or the company given back the jewellery for any reason after melting / breaking before exchange / billing, it will not be returned in the original form and weight.
To the result of the purity test, weight of the gold, the estimated value of my gold including Standard deduction.

conclusion: Further, I have read, understood and am satisfied with the terms and conditions of the scheme and I agree to the same.
